branch-001.narrative_description: Equipment breaks constantly and mysteriously. Nothing works right. Maintenance guy is basically a regular.

branch-002.narrative_description: Manager's family members work at the branch. Constant family drama spilling into work.

branch-003.narrative_description: Nothing dramatic ever happens. Reliable, steady, almost suspiciously uneventful.

branch-004.narrative_description: One of the baristas went viral on TikTok. Now they get influencers and tourists constantly.

branch-005.narrative_description: Near a university. Deals with students, finals week chaos, broke customers, study groups hogging tables.

branch-006.narrative_description: Branch was nearly closed, new manager trying to turn it around. Underdog story.

branch-007.narrative_description: In a major transit station. Extremely high volume, rushed customers, chaotic but profitable.

branch-008.narrative_description: Most staff are aspiring artists/musicians. Lots of call-outs for auditions, gallery shows, etc.

branch-009.narrative_description: Manager is passionate about sustainability. Always implementing new green initiatives, sometimes to staff annoyance.

branch-010.narrative_description: Became the unofficial dog-friendly coffee spot. Now overrun with dogs, for better and worse.

branch-011.narrative_description: Two baristas are dating (or breaking up). The whole staff is invested in the drama.

branch-012.narrative_description: In a rapidly gentrifying neighborhood. Tension between new tech workers and longtime residents.

branch-013.narrative_description: Constantly dealing with a competitor coffee shop next door (Java Junction) that plays loud music, steals customers, and the managers have a petty rivalry.

branch-014.narrative_description: A movie/TV show is filming nearby. Celebrities, film crews, road closures, excitement.

branch-015.narrative_description: Branch undergoing a long renovation that keeps getting delayed. Constant construction issues.

branch-016.narrative_description: In a major tourist area. Dealing with tourists, language barriers, unusual requests.

branch-017.narrative_description: Located next to a sports bar. Game days are chaos, drunk customers wander in, parking nightmares.

branch-018.narrative_description: Located near a hospital. Lots of tired doctors/nurses, emotional customers, unusual hours.

branch-019.narrative_description: Top-performing branch but the manager is disliked by staff. High turnover despite great numbers.

branch-020.narrative_description: Staff believe the building is haunted. Weird things keep happening (lights flickering, cold spots, items moving).
